Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server

Class Server

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.Server
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
Class that represents the Server of the game,Insert and Remove players from the games
Since:
2020/06/19

    Method that insert a player into a match already created and that is waiting other player to start

    Method that move a player in another match, if he keep sending the same nickname(already in use in that match)

    Method that insert a new player in a game, if the game is not yet started it will start a new game with the number of player chosen by the client

    Method that remove from the actual Matches the games where there is a winner or where someone has left the game The Method remove all link between controller of the match and the client

    • main

      Starts the Server
      Parameters:
      args - Args

    • setSocketPort

      public void setSocketPort​(int port)
      Set the socketPort
      Parameters:
      port - Port in which the server will listen for new connections

    • getSocketPort

      public int getSocketPort()
      Get the socketPort
      Returns:
      The port in which the server listen for new connections

    • startSocketServer

      public void startSocketServer​(int port)
      Starts the SocketHandler that listen for new connections,and a new thread that listen for shutdown requests
      Parameters:
      port - Port in which the server will listen for new connections

    • stopServer

      public void stopServer()
      Stop the Server when it is requested by the administrator, closing all connection

    • removeFromConnections

      public void removeFromConnections​(ClientHandler connection)
      Remove the ClientHandler of a client from the list of connected clients
      Parameters:
      connection - ClientHandler of the client that has to be removed

    • checkValidConfig

      public boolean checkValidConfig​(java.lang.String nick, int numberOfPlayer)
      Check if the configuration parameters received from the client are correct
      Parameters:
      nick - Nickname used by the client during a single game
      numberOfPlayer - The modality that the client wants to play
      Returns:
      True if the configuration parameters are valid, false otherwise

    • moveGameStarted

      public void moveGameStarted()
      Method that move a game started from the lobby to the list of game started(actualMatches)

    • removeGameEnded

      public void removeGameEnded()
      Method that remove from the actual Matches the games where there is a winner or where someone has left the game The Method remove all link between controller of the match and the client

    • insertPlayerInGame

      public void insertPlayerInGame​(Message message, ClientHandler connection, boolean isFirstTime)
      Method that insert a new player in a game, if the game is not yet started it will start a new game with the number of player chosen by the client
      Parameters:
      message - Message received from the client with the nickname and number of player
      connection - ClientHandler of the client
      isFirstTime - Boolean used to see if the client has to be moved to another game, because he don't want to change nickName

    • nickError

      public void nickError​(ClientHandler connection, Message message)
      Method that close the connection with a client, if he send a nickname not allowed, ot select wrong number of player
      Parameters:
      connection - ClientHandler of the client
      message - Message received from the client with the nickname and number of player

    • insertFirstTime

      public void insertFirstTime​(GameController match, ClientHandler connection, Message message)
      Method that insert a player into a match already created and that is waiting other player to start
      Parameters:
      match - Controller of the match in which we are going to insert the player
      connection - ClientHandler of the client
      message - Message received from the client with the nickname and number of player

    • insertNotFirstTime

      public void insertNotFirstTime​(GameController match, ClientHandler connection, Message message)
      Method that move a player in another match, if he keep sending the same nickname(already in use in that match)
      Parameters:
      match - Controller of the match in which we are going to insert the player
      connection - ClientHandler of the client
      message - Message received from the client with the nickname and number of player

    • insertNewMatch

      public void insertNewMatch​(ClientHandler connection, Message message, int numberOfPlayer)
      Method called when there is not a game with the requested number of player,the Method create a new game and insert the player in it
      Parameters:
      connection - ClientHandler of the client
      message - Message received from the client with the nickname and number of player
      numberOfPlayer - Number of players of the match that the Method will start

    • getNumberOfPlayer

      public int getNumberOfPlayer​(GameController controller)
      Method that return the number of player(the modality) of a specific match
      Parameters:
      controller - Controller of the match in which we are interested
      Returns:
      The number of player of the match

    • getControllerFromUserID

      public GameController getControllerFromUserID​(java.lang.String userID)
      Method that return the controller of the match in which the Client with a specific UserID has been inserted
      Parameters:
      userID - The UserID of the Client in which we are interested
      Returns:
      The controller of the match of this UserID

    • sendMsgToVirtualView

      public void sendMsgToVirtualView​(Message msg, VirtualView view)
      Method that send the message to the VirtualView of a specific client
      Parameters:
      msg - Message to send to the virtualView
      view - The VirtualView of the client to which we want to forward the message

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer​(GameController controller, ClientHandler connection, Message message, java.lang.String userID)
      Method that add the player in match, and that does all the setup for that player
      Parameters:
      controller - Controller of the macth in which we insert the player
      connection - ClientHandler of the client
      message - Message received from the client with the nickname and number of player
      userID - UserID of the player to insert

    • isFull

      public boolean isFull​(GameController controller)
      Method that check if a specific game is full
      Parameters:
      controller - Controller of the match to check
      Returns:
      True if the game is full, false otherwise

    • isStarted

      public boolean isStarted​(GameController controller)
      Method that check if a game is already started
      Parameters:
      controller - Controller of the match to check
      Returns:
      True if the game is started, false otherwise

    • checkNick

      public boolean checkNick​(Message message, GameController controller)
      Method that check if a nickname is already in use in a match
      Parameters:
      message - Message received from the client
      controller - Controller of the match in which to search
      Returns:
      True if is free, false otherwise

    • newMatch

      public GameController newMatch​(int numberOfPlayer)
      Method that create a new controller, to create a new match
      Parameters:
      numberOfPlayer - Number of player of the new match created
      Returns:
      The controller of the new match

    • handleDisconnection

      public void handleDisconnection​(java.lang.String userID, ClientHandler connection, Message message)
      Method that handle disconnection events, deliver the events to two specific Method that handle disconnection before or during the game
      Parameters:
      userID - UserID of the Client to disconnect
      connection - ClientHandler of the client to disconnect
      message - Message received to understand the type of disconnection

    • handleDisconnectionBeforeGame

      public void handleDisconnectionBeforeGame​(GameController controller, java.lang.String userID, ClientHandler connection, Message message)
      Method that handle disconnection event before the game is started
      Parameters:
      controller - Controller of the match in which the player is
      userID - UserID of the player to disconnect
      connection - ClientHandler of the client to disconnect
      message - Message received to understand the type of disconnection

    • handleDisconnectionDuringGame

      public void handleDisconnectionDuringGame​(GameController controller, Message message, ClientHandler connection)
      Method that handle disconnection events during the game and stop the game
      Parameters:
      controller - Controller of the match to stop, due to a disconnection
      connection - ClientHandler of the client to disconnect
      message - Message received to understand the type of disconnection

    • closeServerIfRequested

      public void closeServerIfRequested()
      Specific thread that listen for a shutdown request by the administrator of the server

    • run

      public void run()
      Specific thread that ping all the clients connected to the Server

      run in interface java.lang.Runnable
